transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Ji bol rahe Gujarat se.
Executive: Ha ji bol rahe Gujarat se.
Customer: Ek minute, kisse baat kar rahe hai aap?
Executive: Gujarat se.
Customer: Ek minute line par rahiye, mai aapki company nikal leta hu ek baar, thik hai?
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir.
Customer: Ah, ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sai Engineering Works se baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ah, boliye, mama ji ka ladka hai.
Customer: Isko, naya, naya account shuru karane ka, kya karna padega mere ko?
Customer: New account open karwana hai?
Customer: Ha, IndiaMART se judna hai uske.
Customer: Achha, aap na apna mere ko personal number dijiye sir ek baar.
Customer: Kya sir? Personal number.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
(silence)
Customer: Ek minute sir line rahiye zara, ek minute line rahiye.
Customer: Ek minute.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir.
Customer: Hello. Ha ji bataiye, bataiye.
Customer: Ha, abhi bataiye. Mere mama ka ladka, mere, mere mama ka ladka hai, uske liye IndiaMART se judna hai, toh kya karna padega usko?
Executive: Ah, usme sir aapki company registered ho jayegi, usme koi issue nahi hai. Thik hai? Aap, aapke paas GST?
Customer: Ha company hai. Ek minute, mere ko aapka number de do kya aapka, customer?
Executive: Sir mai manager ke liye call transfer kar raha hu, ek minute.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Good morning sir, Ankita baat kar rahi hu, voice to manager.
Customer: Ha, toh mere ko, mere toh, mera toh account hai IndiaMART me, mere ko mama ji ka ladka hai mera.
Executive: Sai Engineering Works ke naam se na?
Customer: Ha, woh toh hai mera, nahi, dusra account khulwane ka hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir uska GST document available hai sir dusre firm ka?
Customer: Ah, mai kis naam se send karu sir, mam?
Executive: Nahi sir mai ye janna chah rahi hu sir GST ke documents agar available hai na, toh kya aap GST number bata sakte hai mujhe?
Customer: GST number toh mai, mere mama ji ka ladka hai, usko mai ye number transfer kar deta hu, aap baat kar lena.
Executive: Ye toh recorded line number hai sir, aapke jo account manager hai Mohit hai, Mohit Verma, woh aapko abhi WhatsApp pe connect kar rahe hai. Aap WhatsApp pe sari cheeze provide kar dijiyega, ya fir jo concern person hai unka number provide kar dijiyega. Aap unse discussion karke jo bhi cheeze hai unse baat kar lenge.
Customer: Mere ko ek list dijiye kya kya document chahiye, kya kya nahi chahiye, WhatsApp pe send kar dijiye, mai aapko
Executive: Woh WhatsApp kar rahe hai. Aapka ye jo number hai, last me 117 ye WhatsApp pe available hai na sir?
Customer: Ha, ye, ye, ye, 7575 wala.
Executive: Ha, ha, thik hai. Sir iske alawa jo aapke services chal rahi hai, usme hamare sath Sai Engineering Works isme koi issue toh nahi face kar rahe na?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi, mai abhi mere ko renewal karwane ka hai, toh do ek do din me mere ko ho jayega woh karwane ka hai mere ko. Mohit sir ka phone aa raha hai mere pe, handling kar rahe hai woh. Iske abhi thoda sa payment ka issue aa raha hai toh mai ek do din ke baad woh karwa dunga woh bhi.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir, cheeze smooth kara lijiyega. Actually sir uske Sai Engineering Works ke regarding na, abhi aapke paas ek feedback aayega, jaisa ki aap bata rahe hai ki aap satisfied hai, toh please uske liye aap feedback satisfied hi mark kijiyega, mail pe aapko aayega. Toh woh aap satisfied kar dijiyega. Aur mai aapko WhatsApp pe connect kar rahi hu documents ke regarding, thik hai sir?
Customer: Okay, okay, thank you mam. 
Executive: Sir Sai Engineering Works ka please feedback dijiyega, hame hame achha lagega aap services se satisfied hai, aap feedback denge toh bahut hame bhi feel hoga.
Customer: 2018 se, 2018 se juda hu mai.
Executive: Thik hai sir, mai aapko WhatsApp pe connect kar rahi hu, aap documents provide karwa dijiyega number bhi. Abhi Mohit sir ko WhatsApp kiya bhi hoga.
Customer: Okay, okay, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to open a new account.

- Wants a list of required documents.



Resolution:

- Executive transferred the call to the manager.

- Executive offered to provide documents via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- new account, gst, documents, whatsapp
